title: Jungler Forgot Smite solution
body:
If you are Jungler and you don't have smite

In Game:
You can change one of your Summoner Spells until 1:30  game time.
You cannot change it if you used a Summoner Spell

replies.body:
Would never be implemented. Then people will constantly change spells to try to get an advantage of their lane opponents.

Besides, forgetting smite isn't something you see that often. Maybe once a week if anything.

> [{quoted}](name=Captain KIed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ukPhgjbg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-27T22:30:48.939+0000)
>
> Would never be implemented. Then people will constantly change spells to try to get an advantage of their lane opponents.

How exactly? This is applied only for Junglers. And if you do change it 
all game massage will appear:
>Summoner (Champion) has changes X spell with Smite

if you used one of your Summoner Spell you may no longer able to change any spell to smite
And again this is applied only for the jungler. If you are top laner you are not able to change your Summoners at all

There is 90% chance that you will lose the game if you forgot to get smite. This gives the opponents major advantage of the game. And the worst of all you cannot remake if this happens which also leads to negative experience for your team

But how will it determined who is the jungler? What if people trade roles in champ select? 

This idea is terrible and it is 100% the player's responsibility to make sure they have the right spells under all circumstances. If you're queuing up as jungler, the first thing you should do in champ select is change your summoner to smite. Then this wouldn't be an issue.

Solution: jungler needs to learn to play the game.
No need for bandaid fixes for bad players.
